welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fullerton, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Explore our vibrant downtown, renowned for its unique shops, restaurants, and entertainment. We hope you enjoy your time discovering all that our city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Bonefish Grill

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport is primarily used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network name provided.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United and Alaska Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves domestic flights to various cities in the United States.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Whiteman Airport is dedicated to private and corporate flights, with a separate entrance and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves mostly domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Southwest Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Delta Air Lines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3

terminals.name: Terminal 5

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: A domestic terminal serving Alaska Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7

terminals.name: Terminal 8

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout all terminals at LAX.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
